The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 November is 1,284,891 (2,282.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 16 November, there were 145,796 new confirmed cases (259.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 November, there were 147,353 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 1% (1,557 fewer cases).
